entry.title: Start - Dupont Circle
entry.summary: Starting checkpoint. Safe Zone: Circle, including both sides of street that forms the circle.

entry.title: Kalorama Community Park
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area between 19th, Mintwood, and Columbia including both sides of the streets.

entry.title: African-American Civil War Memorial
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area bounded by T St, 10th, Florida and 9th including both sides of the streets.

entry.title: Ridge House (462 Ridge St NW)
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area bounded by N St, 5th St, M St, and New Jersey Ave including both sides of the streets.

entry.title: Rawlins Park
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Entire area between the two halves of E St (New York Ave) from 21st to 17th, including both sides of the street.

entry.title: C and O Canal
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area bounded by 30th St, M St, 25th St, and K St, including both sides of the streets.

entry.title: Sheridan Circle
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area bounded by P, 22nd, R, and 28th streets including both sides of the streets and the P and Q St bridges.

entry.title: Finish - Dupont Italian Kitchen
entry.summary: Safe Zone: Area bounded by 17th, S, 18th, and Corcoran, including both sides of the streets.
